ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Shield of Song
ygData.msgSnippet: shield of songs is freeport(seafarers)/erudin library and nivs is qeynos/kelethin and come to think bout it i think i got it in the library in erudin. Here s
ygData.messageBody:
shield of songs is freeport(seafarers)/erudin library and nivs is
qeynos/kelethin

and come to think bout it i think i got it in the library in erudin. Here's
what castersrealm has on it:

BARD SPELL DETAILS
Name: Niv's Melody of Preservation
Level: 47
Mana: 0
Class: String, not required
Vendor(s): Kelethin Bard Guild
Qeynos Bard Guild

Approx Spell Cost: 36pp
Researchable: No
Type: Group Duration Health Regeneration Increase
Max Duration: 18 seconds
Casting Time: Instant
Recast Time: Instant
Actual Effects: Party: Increase Strength (10 - 24)
Party: Increase Attack (10 - 21)
Party: Heal (10- 17)
Party: Absorb Spell Dmg (10-21)
Description: This spell is a group buffing spell, particularly useful for
melees. It also stacks with Hymn of Restoration, and Chloroplast type spells
meaning it can give up to 35+ hp regeneration per tick with the right
buffing combinations.



-----Original Message-----
From: Cranfill, Wendy [mailto:Wendy_Cranfill@...]
Sent: April 6, 2001 1:03 PM
To: 'eqbards@yahoogroups.com'
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Shield of Song


Hmm what I'm reading says Seafarers Roost and Erudin
OMG please dont make me go back to Erudin
